name: Best Board Games Free
description:
Best board games is the best in its genre. A unique amazing collection of all your favourite games that can be played with up to 6 friends or against robot players with 3 levels of difficulty.

NOTE: You can play Ludo with no restrictions.
Please upgrade to unlock all the other games and much more.

Please visit our official games page for video preview and much more.
http://www.toparcadeapps.com/games/best-board-games.html

Ludo Classic:
A game that has been enjoyed by millions for many years. Get all your playing pieces home safely before your opponent. Land on your opponent’s space to capture and kiss them goodbye.

Upgrade and you will get:

Snakes and ladders:
Be the first player to reach the finish line. Use ladders to jump over the spaces but beware of those snakes always trying to push you down the board. It’s a race to the very top.

LuBall:
A unique game that mixes ludo and football to bring you a truly engaging game.
The ball will be placed randomly on the pitch and players can capture and control the ball. Players with the ball may not be captured but instead they will lose the ball. LuBall can also be played in pairs, so team up with friends and family to beat your opponents. Choose any team from the UEFA Semi-Finalists.

LuDuo:
A quicker alternative to Ludo Classic that can be played in pairs. Prepare to protect your pieces on this challenging board.

Game of the goose.
A game that originates from Spain with 63 spaces. The aim is to be the first player to finish the board. Landing on a goose will move you to the next goose and the player gets to roll the dice again. Avoid the skull or you will go back to the beginning.

Features.
5 amazing games only available for Apple
Animated players (not like other boring board games)
Proper football kits for your playing pieces
Play with up to 6 players
High quality graphics for all devices
An easy to use interface, which is great for kids and adults
Learn to count as you move your token (ideal for kids)
Win and collect magic stars
Use 5 magic stars to roll any number you need
Play on easy, normal and hard levels
Save your progress and resume whenever you want
Keep tabs on your progress and hi-scores for every game
Compare your scores online with the rest of the world
Relax and enjoy the most complete and entertaining board game
No in-app purchases. Buy once, own it all.
